1. How bracketologists are using artificial intelligence this March Madness  The Associated Press
  2. Charles Barkley tears into Barack Obama’s March Madness bracket as fans bid to beat the near-impossible odds once again  CNN
  3. 2024 NIT bracket: Schedule, TV channels for the men’s tournament  NCAA.com
  4. Want to win your March Madness bracket? These strategies can help  The Athletic
  5. When do March Madness brackets close? Here's when to submit before the tournament tips off  The Cincinnati Enquirer
